1477160.name: Whats wrong with me? Demo
1477160.description: This is a plot detective quest in the Victorian era about one very rich but unhappy family of Trantons. You have to go through many logic puzzles and quests, as well as make difficult moral choices and earn positive karma to form the correct ending of the story game
1477160.supported_languages:
俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
